title: Windows: LLVM 14 and 15 cannot be installed using micromamba
body:
```
  critical libmamba copy_symlink: The file or directory is not a reparse point.: "C:\Users\runneradmin\micromamba-root\pkgs\llvm-tools-15.0.2-h0f93eaf_0\Library\bin\llvm-addr2line.exe", "C:\Users\runneradmin\micromamba-root\envs\lf\Library\bin\llvm-addr2line.exe"
  Error: Failed to execute ["C:\\Users\\runneradmin\\micromamba-bin\\micromamba create -n lf -y --log-level warning \"python=3.10\" \"m2-bison=3.0.4\" \"m2-filesystem\" \"llvmdev=15.0.2\" -f D:\\a\\lfortran\\lfortran\\ci\\environment.yml"]: Error: The process 'C:\Users\runneradmin\micromamba-bin\micromamba.exe' failed with exit code 1
  D:\a\_actions\mamba-org\provision-with-micromamba\main\dist\main\index.js:67118
      throw Error(`Failed to execute ${JSON.stringify(args)}: ${error}`)
            ^
```

See this thread for more info: https://github.com/lfortran/lfortran/pull/910#issuecomment-1279267589
